text: William Joseph Wright (26 October 1952 13 November 2021) was an American-born Australian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the bishop of Maitland-Newcastle from 2011 until September 2021. Wright was born in Washington, D.C.. Wright died on 13 November 2021 at a hospital from lung cancer in Maitland, New South Wales at the age of 69.Bishop Bill Wright dies, aged 69 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Washington, D.C.
title: William Wright (Australian bishop)
